name: imgix-core-js
description: Common boilerplate for all imgix JavaScript-based functionality.

scripts.compile_umd: babel --plugins object-assign --no-comments --modules umd --module-id Imgix --out-file dist/imgix-core-js.umd.js src/imgix-core-js.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run compile && npm run compile_umd && npm run assert_version
